/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and shrubs lining both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A path meanders through the greenery, inviting passersby to take a leisurely stroll. The path leads to a serene lake, its calm waters reflecting the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up at the towering trees and the expansive sky, creating a sense of depth and scale. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image truly captures the essence of a peaceful day in Beijing.
